website_summaries.verdict: Yellow cargo netting is easy to see, while giving you a durable type of material.
pros: Uses a bungee-cord style of material in the netting, ensuring it can stretch to fit over odd shapes in the back of the pickup truck
Should fit a variety of truck beds
Includes heavy-duty plastic hooks to secure the netting to the anchor points in the pickup truck bed
Ships with a carrying case to keep the net tangle-free
cons: Only has a coverage area of 70" x 52"

customer_reviews.title: Is made of stretchy material similar to bungee cords so it adjusts to your needs but better than a bunch of bungees and less exp
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a few times and it does the job very well. Holds loose items in very well and if you are using a tarp it will prevent it from flapping around. My truck is a standard size and find it is plenty big enough for what I do. Is made of stretchy material similar to bungee cords so it adjusts to your needs but better than a bunch of bungees and less expensive as well. Have no idea how long it will last but I store it in the truck not in the sun so I expect a few years. A very good solution for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Dona Trogdon

customer_reviews.title: Good net with bad conhectors
customer_reviews.text: Although the net is fine, the cheap plastic connectors make it a challenge to connect to tie downs. Because they are "fat," they are difficult to get through the loops on my trailer. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Billmore

customer_reviews.title: It gets tangled very easily it seems
customer_reviews.text: It gets tangled very easily it seems, I am considering taking off some of the hooks because they are the areas that get caught the most. Maybe the design could benefit from clips that could attach/reattach easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jnakk

customer_reviews.title: Complete Crap
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on May 30, 2017 was put on the car one week later. Within three days the yellow of the cargo net faded away. As of todays date July 1 2017 the cargo net has completely fallen apart literally turning to dust and is now a pile of little pieces that had to be put in the garbage.. This cargo net is complete crap I would not recommend this in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works well but has a strong odor! Holds down entire load on back of standard pickup!
customer_reviews.author: particular shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at work to hold things in place when I move them from one building to another on a metal cart. It works great--like a set of bungee cords. Getting it out of the package was tough(it was a mess!), but untangling it only took a few minutes & it's worked great since. The only flaw is the hooks: I wish they were metal, not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Holds bags of garbage down.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the knots pulled apart pretty quick. Not exactly high quality but what were you expecting? Decent product. Just don't try to stretch it too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Signilicrad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a bit of a pain to always untangle but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Ogilvy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: All bungy with big hooks. Fit my 6' 8" silverado bed with much to spare.
customer_reviews.author: ryguyryguy

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it says, holds down anything very well The carrying case that it comes with is not anything to brag about
customer_reviews.author: my opinion

customer_reviews.title: 70" x 52" Truck Bed Cargo Tie-Down Net
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for, bigger than what I wanted but have enough hooks to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Although we have not had the need to actually use this item yet, it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: dhs

product_meta.title: Apex 70" x 52" Truck Bed Cargo Tie-Down Net
product_meta.description: The Apex 70" by 52" cargo net designed to conform to and restrain loose items in a pickup truck bed, utility trailer, or other material transport storage area. Constructed from rubber bungee material, the cargo net ties down thick cords using (18) heavy-duty plastic hooks to tie-down anchor points. The bungee casing is colored bright yellow for high visibility and safety. Also works for cargo baskets, basket rails, basket mesh, roof rack bars and more. Maximum 100-pound break strength with a 33-pound working load Limit. Includes a portable storage case to contain the bungee net between uses.
feature_bullets: Wraps around cargo to secure it in place during travel
Mesh design fits full-size and mid-size pickup truck beds
18 Equally spaced heavy-duty plastic tie-down hooks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
